description:
*Available in: English, French, German, & Spanish*

Sitting down somewhere? Tired? Stressed? Or just want something for your kids to look at? Well now you can have an amazing fireplace in the palm of your hands! Just open the app, tap the button when you're ready, and a beautiful high quality fireplace fills your screen!

Check out our other apps:
- Aquarium
- Beach
- American Flag
- Rick Roll
- Solar System
- It's a Trap!
- Metal Gear Solid Soundboard
- Objection!
